Index.title: Hello , I'm
Index.subtitle: Software Developer, Business Administrator & Data Analytics

About.title: About me
About.description:
I am a software developer certified in AWS and a business administrator. I specialize in programming the frontend of web applications and having a general overview of the behavior of my clientsâ€™ businesses.
My mission is to achieve the integration of cloud technology in companies from various sectors and design a good user experience for their clients.
Some of my greatest successes include developing the frontend of applications with national impact, applications with high availability on 2 continents (America and Europa), and achieving certification as an AWS Cloud Practitioner.

Services.title: Services
Services.description: I offer a wide range of services to help you achieve your goals. I can help you with the development of your web application, the design of your business model, and the analysis of your data. I am also certified in AWS and can help you with the integration of cloud technology in your company.
